Description: Pottery ostracon with text referring to habitation,deliverance and temptation.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.58, pl.44)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82667) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82667)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 44:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
